articles.title: Pakistan's current account posts $103 million deficit in May 2025
articles.description: Despite a monthly deficit, current account shows $1.81 billion surplus for first eleven months of FY2024-25
articles.content:
Pakistan’s current account recorded a deficit of $103 million in May 2025, a reversal from the surplus of $47 million in April 2025, according to data released by the State Bank of Pakistan (SBP) on Tuesday.
